title: About Us
content: We’ve been servicing vehicles in the area since 1995. Our skilled mechanics specialize in everything from diagnostics to full rebuilds...

title: Services
content: We offer a full range of vehicle services including logbook servicing, brake repairs, suspension upgrades, and roadworthy inspections...

title: Contact
content: Call us at 123-456 or email hello@mechanicsite.com. We're located at 123 Workshop Lane and open 8am–5pm Mon–Sat...
